title: Northgard [qoob RePack]
description:
Information: 
Year of release : 2017 
Genre : Strategy, Simulator, Indie 
Developer : Shiro Games 
Publisher : Shiro Games 
Publication Type : RePack 
Platform : PC 
Language : Russian, English, MULTi6 
Language of voice : - / - 
Medicine : Wash (CODEX)
System requirements: 
☑OS : Windows Vista or better 
☑Processor : Intel 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo or equivalent 
☑RAM : 1 GB RAM 
☑Video : Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better 
☑Disk space : 500 MB

Description:
Northgard is a strategic game deeply imbued with Scandinavian mythology, in which brave explorers open a new world filled with secrets and dangers, developers say. - Players will encounter mystical creatures, undead, giants, dragons and such a harsh winter that even the most seasoned and brave Vikings will tremble! Players will create settlements, assign tasks to warriors-Vikings, manage resources, expand their own possessions and discover new lands, survive in harsh environmental conditions and clashes with enemies, all in order to fulfill one of the conditions for defeating other players or a computer rival.

Installation:
-Burn
-Install
-Play
